alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 2:49PM CDT until June 17 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 249 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Hebron, or 7 miles northeast of Collins, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hebron around 300 PM CDT. Soso around 310 PM CDT. Ellisville around 320 PM CDT. Laurel around 325 PM CDT. Tuckers Crossing around 335 PM CDT. Mill Creek around 345 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
